title.en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 元 痣だらけの彼女が心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках

altTitles.tr: Eskiden Bandajlarla Kaplanmış Olan Kız Arkadaşım Hakkında Endileşeniyorum

altTitles.ro: Sunt Îngrijorat Pentru Iubita Mea, Care Obișnuia să Fie Acoperită de Vânătăi

altTitles.es-la: Estoy preocupado por mi novia que solía estar cubierta de moretones

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).
description.es-la: Continuación de [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

title.en: VTuber Legend: How I Went Viral after Forgetting to Turn Off My Stream

altTitles.ja: VTuberなんだが配信切り忘れたら伝説になってた

altTitles.ja-ro: VTuber nanda ga Haishin Kiri Wasuretara Densetsu ni Natteta

description.en:
The shocking and controversial work has finally been adapted into a comic! The super popular VTuber comedy begins!

 LiveOn is a major management company that has many glamorous VTubers. The third generation "seiso" VTuber Kokone Awayuki accidentally forgets to turn off her live stream. 

Her completely drunk, natural appearance is broadcast to the world -- the gap is a hit and it goes viral! From that blunder one night, she becomes a super popular VTuber!! (TL from JP synopsis)
description.ja:
衝撃の問題作が遂にコミカライズ化! 大人気VTuberコメディ開幕!
数々の華やかなVTuberが所属する大手運営会社ライブオン。
その三期生で『清楚系』VTuberの心音淡雪は不注意から配信を切り忘れてしまう。
大泥酔の素の姿が世界に配信された結果――
ギャップがウケて大バズり！
一夜の失態から大人気VTuberへ駆け上がっていく!!
description.pt-br:
A LiveOn, uma grande empresa de gerenciamento com vários VTubers brilhantes, tem em seu elenco de terceira geração a VTuber "de imagem pura", Koino Fuyuki. Devido a uma distração, ela acaba esquecendo de encerrar a transmissão ao vivo.

Como resultado, sua aparência completamente bêbada foi transmitida para o mundo — e o contraste fez um sucesso estrondoso! A partir desse erro de uma noite, ela rapidamente se torna uma VTuber extremamente popular!

description.en: Rinne is a girl who can see and exorcise ghosts (usually with a paper fan). When the school punk saves her from getting hit by a truck, but ends up in a coma himself, she, and his disembodied spirit must defend his prone body from being possessed by this, that, and the other local spirits. Unfortunately, she fails in her task, and an ancient playboy takes over the punk’s body, leaving him to inhabit a pink stuffed monkey. Hilarity ensues.

altTitles.vi: Sứa không thể bơi trong đêm

altTitles.en: Jellyfish Can't Swim in the Night

altTitles.ja: 夜のクラゲは泳げない

description.en: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.

altTitles.es: El hombre de un solo golpe

altTitles.th: วันพันช์แมน

description.en:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.  
  



---

**Notes:**  
- Because some groups use the web version of the manga while others use the magazine version, the numbering won't match between different languages.  
- **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of One Punch Man are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-punch-man) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**
description.fa: در جهان اَبَر قهرمان ها قهرمانی بسیار قدرتمند و شکست ناپذیر وجود داره که به (مرد تک مشتی) معروفه چون اون تمامی دشمنان و رقیب هاشو فقط با یک مشت از میدان به در میکنه. بعد از مدتی سایتاما  دیگه از مبارزاتش لذت نمیبره و احساساتی مثل هیجان و ترس رو در خودش فراموش میکنه! و همراه تنها شاگردش که یک سایبورگ هست به انتظار رقیبی خوب ، ماجراهایی رو دنبال میکنن و……
description.ru: Манга повествует о молодом человеке по имени Сайтама. Он — герой, обычный герой. Основная его проблема в том, что он вышибает дух из злодеев одним ударом. А это очень скучно…
description.tr:
Üç yıllık sıkı bir eğitimden sonra, Saitama, tek bir yumrukla herkesi ve her şeyi alt etmesine izin veren muazzam bir güç kazandı. Bir kahraman olarak yeni becerisini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. Bununla birlikte, canavarları kolayca yenmekten çabucak sıkılır ve kahraman olma kıvılcımını geri getirmek için birinin ona meydan okumasını ister.
  Bir cyborg olan Genos, Saitama'nın inanılmaz gücüne tanık olduktan sonra, Saitama'nın çırağı olmaya kararlıdır. Bu süre zarfında Saitama, Kahraman Derneği'nin bir parçası olmadığı için ne hak ettiği takdiri görmediğini ne de insanlar tarafından tanınmadığını fark eder. İtibarını artırmak isteyen Saitama, Genos'u öğrenci olarak alması karşılığında kendisine kaydettirmeye karar verir. İkisi birlikte, güçlü düşmanlar bulmayı ve bu süreçte saygı kazanmayı umarak gerçek kahramanlar olma yolunda ilerlemeye başlar.
description.pt-br: One-Punch Man conta a história de Saitama, um super-herói extremamente poderoso, que se entediou com a ausência dos desafios nas suas lutas contra o mau e procura encontrar um oponente digno para lutar.

description.en: The stunning financial reporter, Zheng Shuyi, is dating a two-timing scumbag? How could she possibly stand back and do nothing about those love birds: the cheating bastard and his white lotus of a mistress. Upon seeing the Rolls-Royce's plate number of the mistress' uncle, which was a straight numerical number plate, Zheng Shuyi made up her mind. Doesn't the cheater plan to marry rich to retire twenty years early, by going down the laughable CEO route? Then I shall become both you and your mistress' aunt!

altTitles.zh: 全民转职：我牧师，都什么阴间技能

altTitles.vi: Tiān Shēng Dú Nǎi, Wǒ Zǔzhòule Quán Shìjiè!

description.en:
Traveling through a parallel world, the game merges with the real world, where ferocious beasts are rampant, alien races are raging, and there are a large number of dungeons and secret realms in the wild.
Humans can awaken into various professions and work hard to kill monsters and upgrade.
On the day of his profession awakening, Lin Luo awakened the priest profession, which is the most popular but has no damage ability.
Just when he was struggling, he discovered that his skills had mutated!
The blood recovery technique mutates into the bleeding technique?
Blessing mutates into curse?
But I am really a healing priest!

Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

description.en:
There's this pub (Izakaya) called " Gen" that was supposed to be in a certain place in the Kanto region of Japan.  
After opening the door one day, it was found to be connected to the city of Parisia, the Capital of the Eastern Kingdom...   
Individual residents from a foreign world such as crestfallen monks, warriors, noble female chevaliers, daughters of noisy famous aristocrats, etc. all visited the peculiar izakaya which they've never seen before, and gradually they'll become fans of the dishes...  
A foreign world gourmet fantasy has finally started!  
  
***From the same author of Isekai Izakaya "Nobu", which takes place in Kyoto.**
description.ja: 『異世界居酒屋「のぶ」』の作者・蝉川夏哉による原作書き下ろしのスピンオフ作品。次なる世界は異世界・東王国、王都パリシィア!王都パリシィアでも、異世界の住人たちは、初めて見る日本の居酒屋料理に戸惑いながらも舌鼓を打ち……。

title.en: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (MICHIHARA Katsumi)

description.en:
Manga adaptation of 1980s.  
  
Five hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  
  


---
description.ru:
История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. И во все эпохи находятся люди, оставляющие след в истории, чьи имена выжжены на её скрижалях. Этих людей называют героями.  
В третьем тысячелетии, когда люди давно переселились с Земли на просторы Галактики, между абсолютной монархией Галактический Рейх и республикой Союз Свободных Планет уже 150 лет продолжается война. И на озарённом пламенем войны небосклоне зажигаются звёзды героев, судьба которых - изменить мир.

altTitles.en: There Is No Place for Fakes
No Place for the Fake Princess

altTitles.ja: ニセモノ皇女の居場所はない

description.en:
Philomel—the fake princess—conspires with her mother to impersonate the imperial princess and cause a war between the Mage Tower and the Empire.
Once her crimes were exposed, she was sentenced to execution.
A death truly befitting of a wicked—

“Even if the Philomel within the book had done some wrong, it wasn’t enough to warrant death!”

Philomel yelled and threw the book she'd been reading.
She had simply been curious about a book she'd picked up in the garden, but the contents of the book stated that she would die!
Although she wanted to believe it was nothing but fiction, everything that happened from that moment onwards went just like in the book.

“Since it has come to this… my goal is to survive!”

Will Philomel be able to discover the origins of the suspicious book and live on?

---
After finding a mysterious book in the imperial garden, Princess Philomel not only discovers that the book's villain shares her name, but that other events in the story are coming true too. Now, she believes that she's an imposter and that the real princess will take her rightful place, leading to the execution of Philomel the Fake! So to avoid a tragic death, she has to make sure the rest of the book doesn't come true. Can this fake princess change what's already been written?
description.fr:
Philomel — la fausse princesse — complote avec sa mère pour se faire passer pour la princesse impériale et provoquer une guerre entre la Tour des Mages et l'Empire. Une fois ses crimes exposés, elle est condamnée à l'exécution. Une mort vraiment digne d'une méchante...

‘Même si la Philomel du livre a fait quelque chose de mal, ce n'est pas assez pour justifier la mort!»

Philomel a crié et a jeté le livre qu'elle lisait. Elle avait simplement été curieuse à propos d'un livre qu'elle avait ramassé dans le jardin, mais le contenu du livre disait qu'elle allait mourir! Bien qu'elle ait voulu croire que ce n'était que de la fiction, tout ce qui s'est passé à partir de ce moment-là s'est déroulé comme dans le livre.

«Puisqu'on en est arrivé là... mon but est de survivre!»

Philomel parviendra-t-elle à découvrir les origines du livre suspect et à survivre?
description.id: Setelah bersekongkol dengan ibunya dan memicu perang antara kekaisaran dan menara sihir, Philomel si 'putri palsu' dihukum mati atas semua kejahatannya... Begitulah isi dari buku mencurigakan yang dipungut oleh Philomel di taman. Ia ingin memercayai bahwa cerita di dalam buku itu hanyalah fiksi, tapi semakin hari kejadian di dunia nyata semakin menyerupai buku itu. Agar tidak bernasib sama dengan Philomel yang ada di dalam buku, Philomel memutuskan untuk berusaha bertahan hidup. Akankah hidupnya berjalan sama seperti dengan buku mencurigakan itu?
description.pl:
Philomel - fałszywa księżniczka - spiskowała ze swoją matką, by podszyć się pod cesarską księżniczkę i wywołać wojnę między Wieżą Magów, a Imperium.
Gdy jej zbrodnie zostały ujawnione, została skazana na śmierć.
Konic godny nikczemnika...
"Nawet jeśli Philomel z książki zrobiła coś złego, to nie było to wystarczające, aby uzasadnić wyrok śmierci!"
Philomel krzyknęła i rzuciła książkę, którą czytała.
Była po prostu ciekawa książki, którą znalazła w ogrodzie, ale jej treść mówiła, że umrze!
Choć chciała wierzyć, że to nic innego jak bajka, wszystko, co wydarzyło się od tego momentu, przebiegało dokładnie tak, jak w książce.
"Skoro do tego doszło... moim celem jest przetrwanie!".
Czy Philomel uda się odkryć pochodzenie podejrzanej książki i żyć dalej?
description.pt-br: Philomel, a 'princesa falsa' que conspirou com sua mãe para se passar por princesa imperial, causou uma guerra ao separar a Torre Mágica do Império. Quando ela é considerada culpada de todos os seus crimes, ela é condenada à morte. Realmente digna de uma vilã... "Eu, não, Philomel no livro fiz algo errado, então não é o suficiente para me matar!" Philomel gritou e jogou o livro que estava lendo. Ela estava apenas curiosoa sobre o livro suspeito que pegou no jardim, mas ela, não, a princesa Philomel do livro morreu! Quero acreditar que é apenas uma ficção, mas de alguma forma tudo o que acontece depois se assemelha ao que está escrito no livro. "Agora que está assim... meu único objetivo é sobreviver!" Philomel será capaz de revelar o que aquele livro suspeito diz e reivindicar sua vida?

title.en: Motto mo Kirawareteiru Saikyou no Akuyaku ni Tensei

altTitles.ja: 最も嫌われている最凶の悪役に転生

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as the Most Hated Villain

description.en:
Arima Seto is a 23-year-old part-time worker. One day, he is reincarnated as Lobelia Crowley, the most vicious villain in the popular smartphone game Arcadia Fanrasy!

He tries to do good deeds to avoid the catastrophe ending, but he can't stop using his sharp tongue...!?
description.ja:
23歳のフリーター・瀬戸有馬。ある日人気スマホゲームの最凶の悪役、ロベリア・クロウリーに転生してしまった……！　

破滅エンドを回避するため善行を積もうとするが、毒舌口調が止まらなくて―!?

altTitles.ja: 師匠、あと49回死んでください

description.en:
When the powerless thirteenth prince became emperor, he gave his tutor, Yo Yohwa, poison. His reason being his death at the hands of his own master in countless previous lives. The poisoned Yo Yohwa then regresses to an earlier time together with the prince and is determined to get on his good side this time in order to escape. However, the prince already discovered the truth…

“This is crazy. You killed me in the previous lives, and you neglected me in another. Now you’re acting all nice. Are you trying to get away?”

altTitles.ja: TS衛生兵さんの戦場日記

altTitles.pt-br: Diário de Guerra da Enfermeira Transgênero

description.en:
An ex-pro gamer of the FPS genre (♂) reincarnated in a fantasy world filled with magic... Only to learn that what greeted him was not a scene from one's dreams, but a muddy battlefield full of bullets flying to and fro! Moreover, he's now an orphan girl named Touri Noel?!

After her aptitude for healing magic was discovered, she decided to volunteer in the army as a second-class medic, all to raise money for the orphanage where she was born and raised. However, without even getting magic training, she was attached to an assault squad, repeatedly fighting on the most cruel battlefields of the "Western Front."
The mission given to her was to become the personal medic of the frontline's ace, Garback, and not let him die at any cost. But he turned out to be the worst commander, who will try to get results whatever the cost, even if it means the death of his subordinates!

On the battlefield, mired in unreasonable orders and violence, Touri's fierce battle for survival continues...
description.ja:
FPSの元プロゲーマー♂が転生した世界は魔法が存在するファンタジー世界だった――が、そこには夢広がる冒険はなく、銃弾が飛び交う泥沼の戦場が待っていた！　しかも、トウリ・ノエルという名の孤児の「少女」として……!?

トウリは回復魔法への適性を見出され、生まれ育った孤児院への資金援助のため軍に志願し二等衛生兵となる。しかし魔法の訓練も受けないまま、彼女は最も過酷な戦闘が繰り広げられている「西部戦線」の突撃部隊へと配属されてしまう。
彼女に与えられた任務は戦線のエースであるガーバックの専属衛生兵となり、絶対に彼を死なせないこと。けれどガーバックは部下を見殺しにしてでも戦果を上げる最低の指揮官でもあった！

理不尽な命令と暴力が飛び交う戦場で、トウリはただ生き残るために奮闘するが――。

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.es-la: El Gran Villano Hermano Mayor y todas sus Hermanas Menores Yandere

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

title.en: Inkya de Wotaku de Binbou Dakedo Bijin Ojou-sama ni Osaretemasu

altTitles.ja: 陰キャでヲタクで貧乏だけど美人お嬢様に推されてます

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya de Wotaku de Binbou Dakedo Bijin Ojou-sama ni Osaretemasu

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um otaku tímido e pobre, mas essa jovem linda e rica está obcecada por mim

altTitles.ru: Я застенчивый и бедный отаку, но эта красивая богатая юная леди одержима мной.

altTitles.en: I'm a Shy and Poor Otaku, but This Beautiful Rich Young Lady Is Obsessed With Me

description.en: Eiji is a high school student who lives with his father, an unsuccessful novelist. He is a shy, otaku, and poor boy, but he is an honest boy who never forgets the compassion for others that his late mother taught him. Even he yearns for Aoi, the daughter of the president of a large company. However, Eiji is unable to look Aoi in the eye because of the huge disparity between her and himself. One day after school, Aoi greets Eiji when he comes home. Aoi says one surprising thing to the surprised Eiji...
description.ja:
YouTube動画で550万再生！　運命に導かれたベタ甘ラブコメ！
エイジは陰キャでヲタクで貧乏だけど他人に対する思いやりの気持ちを忘れない素直な少年。そんなエイジも憧れる社長令嬢アオイさんがある日、エイジの自宅を訪れ、突如としてエイジとの婚約を告げるが…。

Yūchūbu dōga de 550 man saisei! Unmei ni michibika reta beta ama rabu kome! Eiji wa in kya de wotaku de binbōdakedo tanin ni taisuru omoiyari no kimochi o wasurenai sunaona shōnen. Son'na eiji mo akogareru shachō reijō aoi-san ga aru hi, eiji no jitaku o otozure, totsujotoshite eiji to no kon'yaku o tsugeruga….
description.ru: Эйдзи — старшеклассник, живущий со своим отцом, неудачливым писателем. Он застенчивый, отаку, бедный, но честный мальчик, который никогда не забывает о сострадании к другим, как его научила покойная мать. Он тоскует по Аой, дочери президента крупной компании. Однако, Эйдзи не может смотреть Аой в глаза из-за огромного несоответствия между ней и им самим. Однажды после школы Аой приветствует Эйдзи, когда тот приходит домой. Аой говорит удивленному Эйдзи одну удивительную вещь...
description.pt-br: Eiji é um estudante do ensino médio que vive com seu pai, um romancista malsucedido. Ele é um baita nerd, e mesmo sendo pobre é um menino obediente que não esquece a compaixão alheia que sua falecida mãe lhe ensinou. Aoi, filha do presidente de uma grande empresa, admira essa idade. No entanto, Eiji não conseguia nem olhar para a enorme disparidade consigo mesmo. Depois da escola um dia, Aoi cumprimenta Eiji quando ela chega em casa. Eiji fica surpreso quando Aoi lhe diz uma palavra de surpresa...

altTitles.ja: ウルフちゃんは澄ましたい

altTitles.id: Gadis Serigala Mencoba Untuk Berpura pura Tidak Peduli

altTitles.en: Wolf-chan Is Trying to Feign Indifference

description.en:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
description.ja: ウルフカットで一匹狼なクール系女子の尊い片想い！
description.pt-br: A loba solitária fria, e seu precioso amor não correspondido!

title.en: The Fairytale-like You Goes on the Assault

altTitles.ja: 儚いキミは猛攻をはじめる

altTitles.ja-ro: Hakanai Kimi wa Moukou wo Hajimeru

altTitles.zh: 童话般的你开始了恋爱猛攻

description.en: Kagari, an ephemeral beauty, reunites with her older childhood friend, Nana-kun, and begins her romantic assault on him.
description.vi: Một series siêu ngọt nữa tới từ Hazano Kazutake - tác giả của bộ Thánh nữ Cecilia và mục sư Lawrence. Câu chuyện về đôi bạn thưở nhỏ cứ tối đến là lại ở chung nhà để đảm bảo sự an toàn cho nhau...

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

description.en:
Steve is a builder that just wants to mine materials and craft in peace, but the mysterious monster girls that surround him wont leave him in peace!

---

**Note:** This is the webtoon version of [Minecraft - Anime Edition](https://mangadex.org/title/ad547db3-2e92-4f9b-b386-70c9f88fc0c1)
A beautifully-illustrated story of a deaf girl and the words and feelings she want to express.
From the mangaka of Seeds of Anxiety comes another collection of short horror stories using introspection that will unhinge you… Best for midnight viewing!

title.en: Butakai Ouji to 100 Kai no Kiss

altTitles.ja-ro: Butakai Ouji to 100 Kai no Kisu
Butakai Ouji to Hyakkai no Kiss

altTitles.es: El porquerizo y los 100 besos de la princesa

altTitles.en: The Swineherd and the Princess's 100 Kisses
The Swineherd Prince and the 100 Kisses

altTitles.ja: 豚飼い王子と100回のキス

description.en:
A young prince falls for the Emperor's youngest daughter, and asks for her hand in marriage. When she refuses him, he disguises himself as a swineherd to win her heart and to test her personality. Will he succeed or does a different fate await them?  
  
Based on the Hans Christian Anderson fairytale "The Swineherd."

title.en: Homeland Dropout: The Time I Was Reincarnated as the Fourth Enchanter in the Entire World

altTitles.ja: 落ちこぼれ国を出る ～実は世界で4人目の付与術師だった件について～

altTitles.en: After being deported from the country, I became the 4th enchanter in the world!
Leave the fallen country ~Actually, about being the fourth granting surgeon in the world~

altTitles.ru: После депортации из страны, я стал 4 зачарователем в мире!
Я покидаю падшую страну ~На самом деле история о том, как я стал 4 зачарователем в мире~

altTitles.en: Homeland Dropout: The Time I Was Reincarnated as the Fourth Enchanter in the Entire World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ochikobore kuni o deru ~ jitsuwa sekai de 4 hitome no fuyo-jutsu-shidatta kudan ni tsuite ~

description.en:
Having lived a useless 30 years of his life, the main character (Saito Jinkuro) is hit by a truck. When he wakes up, he enters the body of "Dzink Norland", the 14-year-old son of an aristocrat who served as his Highness' escort. But due to the lack of skills with a spear, which were inherent in all members of his family, and terrible behavior, he was kicked out of the guard post, and then completely deported from the country... In addition to these problems, a window pops up before the eyes of the protagonist with information about "Elsa", his nanny. Another world, deportation from the country and windows like in video games? What will the main character do?

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9677fw/)  (jp)
_
description.ru: Прожив бесполезные 30 лет своей жизни, главного героя (Сайто Дзинкуро) сбивает грузовик. Очнувшись, он попадает в тело "Дзинка Нонланда", 14-летнего сына аристократа, который служил конвоиром его высочества. Но из-за отсутствия навыков обращения с копьем, которые были присуще всем членам его семьи, и ужасного поведения, его выгоняют с поста конвоира, а после и вовсе депортируют из страны... Помимо этих проблем, перед глазами главного героя выскакивает окно с информаций о "Эльзе", его няне. Другой мир, депортация из страны и окна как в видео-играх? Как же поступит главный герой?

altTitles.en: Ao Haru Ride x My Love Story!! Crossover Special.

description.en:
Two high-school boys run into each other, and find that they've swapped bodies.  
  
"Ao Haru Ride" and "Ore Monogatari!!" special collaboration one-shot, celebrating "Bessatsu Margaret" 50th anniversary since launch.

A collection of short stories:  
  
1. Akuma no Puzzle  
Kanna’s everyday routine includes being spoiled like a real princess by her childhood friend Ritsu who lives in the same mansion. But one night, when the two of them are walking alone outside, a demon escaping to the world of humans possesses Ritsu! He is completely transformed by the invading demon, puzzling everyone around him and Kanna most of all.  
  
2. Kare to Kanojo to + 1 (Him and Her, Plus One)  
  
3. Karigami no Himegimi (Karigami Princess)  
  
4. Shichigatsu no Hanayome (July Bride)

altTitles.ja: ソニック・ザ・ヘッジホッグ

description.en:
A lighthearted adventure series based off then-current Sonic games, changing focus nearly every year. Games covered in story arcs include:  
  
- Sonic Unleashed  
- Sonic & The Black Knight  
- Sonic Chronicles  
- Sonic Colors  
- Sonic Generations

altTitles.th: ตั๋วโกงชีวิต

description.en:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
description.fr:
L'esprit de Lee Kyung Ho était complètement bouleversé à l'idée de mettre fin à ses jours à cause du harcèlement et de la perte de sa mère. Il essaie, mais il est sauvé. Sa détermination à se suicider séduit Sierra, une faucheuse sinistre qui lui offre plus tard un pacte. Ce pacte lui permet d'emprunter les pouvoirs des morts dans leur vie antérieure en échange de plusieurs années sacrifiées de sa vie. Afin d'atteindre ce qu'il souhaite, il finit par l'accepter.  
  
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771)
description.ru: Ли Кён Хо был поглощен идеей суицида, из-за издевательств в школе и гибели его матери. Очередная попытка, но спасен. Его решимость покончить с собой каким-то образом соблазняет Сиеру, мрачного жнеца, который позже предлагает ему контракт. Этот контракт даёт возможность заимствовать способности и силы мертвых из их предыдущей жизни, в обмен на силу, он должен жертвовать годами, которые ему остались на этой земле. Ради достижения того, чего он желает, он всё таки соглашается на сделку.
description.es-la: Lee Kyung Ho queria terminar su vida debido al acoso y la pérdida de su madre. Intenta hacerlo, pero no lo consigue. Su determinación de suicidarse de alguna manera fracasa, una persona llega y le ofrece un contrato. Este contrato lo bendice con la capacidad de tomar prestados los poderes de los muertos en su vida anterior a cambio de sacrificar años de su vida. Para lograr lo que desea y el acepta el trato.

description.en:
On a continent protected by four witches stands Winfred Academy, a prestigious school of magic. When an incident occurs at the school, Anz finds himself right in the middle of it…  


---
description.fr: A l'Académie Winfred, prestigieuse école de magie, les élèves n'ont qu'une chose en tête : devenir la prochaine sorcière du vent, l'une des quatre sorcières protégeant le continent. Au milieu de cette effervescence, Anz essaye tant bien que mal d'éviter les ennuis…

altTitles.th: นักสืบแห่งมิวเอลล่า

description.en:
Kate Smith enjoys her quiet life as a maid and has no interest in getting married. Her resolve only deepens as she watches her peers swoon over the moody manservant, Ian. Whether it's fate or bad luck, Kate quickly finds herself in a series of compromising encounters with him. One day another maid goes missing and the mystical happenings that follow only intensify her suspicions about Ian. As the expert detective Jade Killian comes into town, can he help her uncover the truth?

---
Kate is a maid at the Baron's estate in Muiella, a country where warlocks and witches are shunned. One day, the new servant Ian arrives… but he's much too proper and handsome for his lowly rank. As they keep running into each other, Kate's suspicion of Ian's disarming demeanor only grows when strange incidents crop up in the manor. Sleuthing for the truth, the wellbeing of the estate and its residents may be at stake! Where's a good detective when you need one?!

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/50099907)

**Official Translation:**
* English: [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-detective-of-muiella/info), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/detmuiella/) (expired)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/lenqueteur-de-muiella)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Detective-of-Muiella/210)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/18201)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2/34)
description.fr:
Simple deomestique dans un manoir à la campagne, elle ne pensait pas se retrouver mêlée à un mystère. Alors qu’elle ne désire qu’avoir une petite vie tranquille, la visite d’un enquêteur au manoir et l’arrivée d’un valet mystérieux vont bouleverser son petit quotidien. La disparition d’une de ses amies va la pousser à enquêter sur les mystères entourant le manoir...

---
Kate est une domestique dans un manoir à Muiella, une contrée où les gens dotés de pouvoirs magiques sont rejetés. Un jour, Ian, un nouveau domestique arrive… Mais il est bien trop impeccable et élégant pour un simple servant.

Les soupçons de Kate quant au comportement désarmant de Ian ne font que grandir à mesure que d’étranges incidents se produisent dans le manoir.

La recherche de la vérité pourrait bien mettre tous les résidents en danger! Où trouver un bon détective quand on en a besoin?!

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/50099907)

**Official Translation:**
* English: [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-detective-of-muiella/info), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/detmuiella/) (expired)

* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2/34)
description.ko:
마법사와 마녀를 배척하는 나라. 뮈엘라.
뮈엘라의 시골 영지 알라나데일의 저택에서 하녀로 일하는 케이트.

어느 날, 그녀가 일하는 데일 남작가에 수상한 하인이 들어온다.

하인에 어울리지 않는 훤칠한 키에 단정한 외모를 가진 그는 첫날부터 주목을 받지만,
케이트는 사사건건 자신과 부딪치는 이안이 마음에 들지 않는다.

한편 그녀가 몸담은 데일 남작가에 불길한 사건들이 하나둘 일어나기 시작하는데…….

---

description.uk:
Муелла - країна, яка неприймає чарівників та відьом. Кейт працює покоївкою в сільській місцевості в маєтку Аланалейл. Одного разу в маєток влаштовується підозрілий слуга. Він недостатньо вмілий для слуги, і в нього гарна зовнішність. Тим часом у будинку барона починають відбуватися зловісні події.

---

description.en:
“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
description.pl:
Ponury i niegościnny świat po katastrofie ekologicznej. Spustoszoną ziemię bombarduje promieniowanie kosmiczne. Niedobitki ludzkości schroniły się w dwóch ostatnich ocalałych bazach, desperacko próbując przetrwać. Każdy kontakt z obcym organizmem żywym grozi skażeniem genetycznym.

Do bazy ludzi trafia zagubiony chłopak, który w rzeczywistości nie jest nawet człowiekiem. Los styka go z bezlitosnym sędzią, wyszkolonym do tropienia i likwidowania mutantów. Niespodziewanie ich znajomość przeradza się w coś więcej…

Polskie tłumaczenie powieści dostępne tutaj: https://www.wattpad.com/story/251281478-little-mushroom

description.en:
Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. “I want you to protect me,” she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!
___
Character Design: [Kanase Bench](https://mangadex.org/author/58a70142-dece-49d1-86b3-e19aa9afadf9)
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10570/episode/350366)
[Official X Account](https://x.com/witch_mercenary)
description.es-la: Zig, un mercenario alto y de anchos hombros, participa en una caza de brujas. Tras un feroz duelo con la mortífera bruja, se entera de su deseo. "Quiero que me protejas", le pide ella, cansada de que trivialicen su vida. En busca de un lugar donde sobrevivir, la bruja y el mercenario ponen sus miras en un continente desconocido.

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

altTitles.vi: Cô Gái Thân Yêu Của Tôi

description.en:
"It seems like I'd like someone like you."

"You're really like a little pony." 

This is a slice-of-life of the romance and exploits of an adorkable and ditzy senior "little fox" and her dependable junior "little pony".
description.uk: "Здається, мені б сподобався хтось на кшталт тебе". "Ти справді як маленьке поні". Буденність про романтику та подвиги чарівної й навіженої Старшої "лисички" та її надійної Молодшої "поні".
description.zh: “我好像会喜欢你这样的人。” “你好像一匹小马。” 呆萌跳脱年上“小狐狸”和她的靠谱 “年下小马驹”的爱情事业双丰收日常 。

altTitles.ja: カードファイト!! ヴァンガードスカイライド

description.en:
A single encounter with a card will take you to the skies!
The Card Game that Soars through the Skies, this is Vanguard's New series, 'SkyRide'!

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

description.en: (from ebookjapan):Kazuo Umezu's "Ultraman" was serialized at the same time as the 1966 TV broadcast! The fierce battles with popular monsters such as the Baltan and Mefilas aliens are fully recorded along with the color pages from the serialization and the chapter covers!Kazuo Umezu's very famous manga adaptation of the first Ultraman series.
At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
description.pt-br: No mercado, um homem se depara com uma escrava particularmente arrogante...

title.en: Gōnglüè duìxiàng! Nǐ rén shè wāile a!

altTitles.zh: 攻略对象！你人设歪了啊！

description.en:
"Why won't you like me...gege?"
"Don't call me gege, it's disgusting."

......So I'm now in a dating sim with this non-romanceable target who looks just like my brother—— why does he keep pestering me?!

Jin Daim, who was being bullied by delinquents, encounters a game on his old phone that changes his life. A fraudulent strategic RPG game where you can boss around the delinquents and recruit benevolent helpers to grow stronger! The ultimate goal of this RPG game is to eliminate school violence from the world.

Reiji Saeki was living in a north-eastern countryside town and lost his life in an accident during summer vacation. But before he knew it, a mysterious ball of light appeared in front of his eyes in a world of whiteness. Being a magician from a parallel world, that ball of light is looking for someone qualified to inherit the magic they had created in order to prevent it from being lost. Reiji, who took on that suggestion, lives in the parallel world Elgin, with a new body and powerful magic.

We may be like this, but if we don't give up, we will surely reach the dream stage, Koshien!"

Jyosei Private Academy. After it changed its policy and became a cut-throat academic elite school, its once powerful baseball team has become weak with only four members left. However, baseball maniac Ruito Hibino has a secret plan!

Aiming for Koshien is an amateur tag-team of misfits!?

Straight from the bottom of hell!

A straightforward tale of baseball played by hated people!

title.en: The Return of the Disaster-Class Hero

description.en:
Twenty years.

For twenty long years, the thirteenth saint Lee Geon was trapped inside the Tower of Demons after being backstabbed by twelve of his allies. These twelve "saints" were warriors chosen by the twelve Zodiac gods to defeat mysterious monsters called "calamities" that were massacring the planet. Though no god had chosen Geon as a saint, he became the mightiest of them all, which made him a hero... and a target.

But now, Geon has brawled his way out of the tower, and he's back stronger than ever. All that's left is to exact brutal payback on each of the saints, but none of these powerful beings will go down without a fight.

Will Geon be able to stay in one piece while achieving the divine revenge of his dreams?

---

- [Tapas English Translation](https://tapas.io/series/the-return-of-the-disaster-class-hero/info)
description.fr:
Il était une fois un héros qui considéré autre fois comme le plus puissant de la Terre.

« Mais il est mort… Comment une personne désignée comme morte pourrait-il revenir ? »
« Ouais, j’aimerais bien voir ça, moi aussi. »

Mais 20 années plus tard, il revint.

« Pourquoi êtes-vous aussi choqués, les gars ? À voir vos gueules, on pourrait croire que vous vous sentez coupable ? »

‘Ces enfoirés… je vais pas les laisser s’en tirer comme ça…’
description.ko:
지상에 최강의 영웅이 있었다.

“하지만 죽었잖아. 우리가 죽인 놈이 어떻게 돌아와?”
“그러게. 돌아올 수 있으면 한번 돌아와 보라지.”

그런데 20년 만에 진짜 돌아와 버렸다?

“뭘 그리 놀래? 왜. 양심에 찔릴 짓이라도 하셨나?”

이 XX들. 가만 안 둔다.

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sy4PeK3mCrI)
description.pt-br:
Eu era o maior herói da Terra.

“Mas ele está morto. Como aquele cara que matamos está de volta?”

“Não sei.”

Eu realmente voltei depois de 20 anos?

“Por que estão tão surpresos? Fizeram algo para ficar com a consciência pesada?”

Seus desgraçados. Vocês não perdem por esperar.

title.en: Transmigrating as the Younger Sister of a Bigshot with Multiple Identities

description.en: Dear Villainesses, you lost your fiancé and I lost my one billion! Just when I had received news that I inherited my family’s assets, I immediately transmigrated into a cookie cutter villainess story, as the hated villainess right after “I” made enemies of everyone in the story! Now witness me slither my way into everyone’s heart and reach the ending of the story in one piece!

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

title.en: The Supporting Female Is Reborn, She Will No Longer Serve This Broken Plot

altTitles.zh: 女配重生，这破剧情她不伺候了

description.en:
Yin Susu couldn't believe that she was reborn again, her life was repeating again, the setting was the same, the painful things were the same.

She thought that she would just become a salted fish,* living a lazy life, waiting for death, waiting for everything to end, for the female lead to die, which would mean the end of everything, but she did not want to accept her fate!

"If you, the female lead, has a golden hand, then I will break that golden hand."

*salted fish: metaphor of a corpse or a person who doesn't want to do anything.

After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

The strongest hero of humanity, Kim Sung Bin.

He threw everything on the line and fought… but he still couldn’t prevent the destruction of the world.

However, his legend has just begun as he returns 20 years into the past.

“I’ll definitely… kill it this time.”

Now fully equipped with overwhelming power and experience, the hero’s raid isn’t over yet!
description.ko:
인류 최강의 영웅, 김성인
모든 것을 내던지며 분투했지만
결국…… 세상의 멸망은 막지 못했다

하지만 그의 전설은 이제 시작이었으니
성인, 20년 전으로 회귀하다!

“이번에는…… 반드시 잡는다.”

압도적인 재능과 경험으로 무장한 완전체
영웅의 레이드는 아직 끝나지 않았다!
description.ru: Сильнейший герой человечества Ким Сон Бин. Он бросил все на кон и сражался, но… не cмог предотвратить разрушение мира. Однако его легенда только начинается, когда Сон Бин возвращается на 20 лет в прошлое.
description.pt-br:
O herói mais forte da humanidade, Kim Sung Bin.

Ele jogou tudo na linha e lutou... mas ele ainda não conseguiu impedir a destruição do mundo.

No entanto, sua lenda apenas começou quando ele retorna 20 anos no passado.

"Com certeza... vou matá-lo desta vez."

Agora totalmente equipado com poder e experiência esmagadores, o ataque do herói ainda não acabou!

title.en: Koitsura no Shoutai ga Onna dato Ore dake ga Shitteiru

altTitles.ja: こいつらの正体が女だと俺だけが知っている

altTitles.en: Only I Know These Guys are Women

altTitles.zh: 这两个家伙都是女生的事实只有我知道

description.ja: 男の中の男と憧れていた幼なじみ、真琴と忍。竜之介は、彼らと学園寮で相部屋となり、ムサいけど男らしい青春の幕開けを予感していた。だがその正体は女だった！　しかもふたりとも！！！かくして竜之介の青春は、むちむち＆えちえち、かつポロリ頻度ＭＡＸなものとなってしまった！！
